genericResponses.response: Do you feel strongly about discussing such things?

I'm not sure I understand you fully.

goodbyes.message: Goodbye.  I'm looking forward to our next session.
Goodbye.  It was nice talking to you.
Goodbye.  This was really a nice talk.
Maybe we could discuss this moreover in our next session?   Goodbye.
This was a good session, wasn't it -- but time is over now.   Goodbye.

greetings.greeting: How do you do. Please tell me your problems.
Please tell me what's been bothering you.
